thread.title: BRIEF-Northern Oil And Gas Announces Public Offering Of Common Stock

title: BRIEF-Northern Oil And Gas Announces Public Offering Of Common Stock
text: March 19, 2018 / 8:48 PM / Updated 2 minutes ago BRIEF-Northern Oil And Gas Announces Public Offering Of Common Stock Reuters Staff March 19 (Reuters) - Northern Oil And Gas Inc: * NORTHERN OIL AND GAS, INC. ANNOUNCES PUBLIC OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK * NORTHERN OIL AND GAS INC - ‍COMMENCEMENT OF AN UNDERWRITTEN PUBLIC OFFERING OF AN AGGREGATE VALUE OF $105 MILLION OF SHARES OF ITS COMMON STOCK * NORTHERN OIL AND GAS - ‍INTENDS TO USE NET PROCEEDS FROM THIS OFFERING TO CONTINUE TO PURSUE ACQUISITION OPPORTUNITIES, TO FUND ITS DRILLING PROGRAM​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
